title: BMW Diagnostics
description: Advanced computer diagnostics using BMW-specific ISTA/INPA tools. We read every module to pinpoint issues accurately before any work begins.

title: Acoustic Noise Detection
description: Our advanced acoustic diagnostic device pinpoints the exact source of any noise on your vehicle â€” eliminating guesswork, reducing misdiagnosis, and cutting repair time.
features: Works on engine, suspension, drivetrain & body

title: Engine Repair
description: From VANOS and Valvetronic systems to timing chains and head gaskets, we handle the complex BMW engine work other shops turn away.

title: Brakes & Suspension
description: Precision brake and suspension service to keep your BMW handling the way it was designed to. OEM and performance parts available.

title: Oil & Fluid Service
description: BMW-approved oils and fluids applied to factory specifications. We reset service indicators and maintain your digital service history.

title: Electrical Systems
description: BMW electrical systems are complex. We diagnose and repair everything from battery registration to iDrive faults and comfort access modules.

title: A/C & Cooling
description: Beat the Caribbean heat. Full A/C diagnostics, recharging, and cooling system overhauls to keep your BMW running cool.

title: Performance Tuning
description: Unlock your BMW's hidden potential. ECU remapping, intake and exhaust upgrades, and dyno-verified power gains.

title: Upgrades & Modifications
description: From coilover kits to big brake conversions, we build BMWs that perform as good as they look. Quality parts, expert fitment.
